sections.code: This examplary LiaScript document adresses basic Markdown formats.

Lists and numbers
-----------------

* alpha
+ **beta**
- gamma
  and delta

  new Paragraph

  - and another
  - important list

- epsilon

Block quotes
-----------------

> This was said some time ago ...
>
>> This was said even longer ago,
> > I guess ...
>
> * aleph
> * beth

Table
-----------------

| Tables               |      Are      |  Cool |
| -------------------- |:-------------:| -----:|
| *** columns 3 is *** | right-aligned | $1600 |
| ** column 2 is **    |   centered    |   $12 |
| * zebra stripes *    |   are neat    |    $1 |

``` python
import time
# Quick, count to ten!
for i in range(10):
    # (but not *too* quick)
    time.sleep(0.5)
    print(i)
```
